content: - exit thunderbird on new pc - copy the thunderbird folder from the ....appdata\roaming\ folder from old PC and paste into c:\users\<yourid>\appdata\roaming to overwrite the exiting thunderbird folder. - restart thunerbird
creator: davidsk

content:
Николай Коханович said
Hello, I have the following problem: let's say there is a Word file on the desktop, if I right-click on it and select Thunderbird in the "Send" item, the window for creating a message with this attached file does not open, but the document itself opens in Word. Can you tell me how to make the window of message creation with this attached file open?

In Windows, the usual process is to select 'Send to' in the file context menu and then 'Mail recipient'. This will open a new message in the default mail app with the file attached. It sometimes fails if other mail apps like Outlook are installed and are conflicting with TB being the default app. In that case, define TB as the default both in Windows settings and TB Settings/General/System Integration.

content:
Please post an image showing the Folder Pane. When you say 'local folders' do you mean 'Local Folders' mail account ?

'Drafts' and 'Templates' both have icons that look like a letter, so it sounds like you may have a folder which has been set up to be the chosen folder for Drafts or Templates.

Check Account Settings

  • Account Settings
  • Select 'Copies & folders' for the account which has the folder with wrong 'letter' icon

Check the 'Drafts and Templates' sections. So for Drafts.... If pop:

  • Select: 'Drafts folder on: and choose mail account name/email address

If imap:

  • Select 'Other' and choose eg: 'Drafts on mail account name/email address

content:
Junk will get emptied if you have set up Thunderbird to empty it.

You will need the following settings:

  • Account Settings
  • Select 'Junk Settings' for the account

DEstination and Retention:

  • Select 'Move new junk messages to:

If POP:

  • Select 'Junk folder on' and choose email address of account.

If IMAP:

  • Select 'Other' and choose 'Spam on mail account/email address'

DO NOT select the checkbox 'Automatically delete junk mail older than...

Please note: If this is an Imap mail account then you may discover the server is automatically deleting the contents of the Spam folder.

Also check the Global Settings:

  • Settings > Privacy & Security
  • Scroll to 'Junk' section
  • Select: When I mark messages as junk
  • Select 'Move them to the accounts junk folder
  • Select 'Enable adaptive junk filter logging

Also check Junk/Spam folder:

  • Right click on folder and select 'Properties'
  • On 'Retention Policy' tab
  • Select 'Use my account settings'
  • Select 'Don't delete any messages'
creator: Toad-Hall

Do you know of any way to get them back short of going to my backup. I shouldn't have to do this.

content:
The general advice is not to 'turn off' the antivirus, but to exclude the TB profile folder from AV scanning, while retaining the real-time background scanning that should guard against opening infected attachments.

https://wiki.mozilla.org/Thunderbird:Testing:Antivirus_Related_Performance_Issues#Norton_Security

http://kb.mozillazine.org/Antivirus_software

Test the effect of bypassing startup apps like AV by running Windows in safe mode.
creator: sfhowes

content: Thank you! I've taken your advice and excluded virus scanning of the profile directory. Since this has been happening at random intervals, I probably won't know for awhile. Will post again if trouble recurs.
creator: vnd251

content:
La donazione è ovviamente facoltativa, anche se aiuta gli sviluppatori a portare avanti il progetto. La procedura che sto per descrive quindi è valida comunque anche se non si effettuano donazioni:

  • quella che visualizzi all'apertura del programma non è una email ma una pagina iniziale che riporta informazioni su Thunderbird ed invita a sostenere il progetto
  • per modificare questa pagina iniziale vai in menu > Impostazioni > Generale
  • nella casella Posizione puoi inserire l'indirizzo di una qualsiasi pagina web che ti interessi visualizzare quando avvii Thunderbird
  • se invece non vuoi visualizzare nulla, togli la spunta da All’apertura di Thunderbird mostra la pagina iniziale nell’area messaggi
creator: @next

content: Just a guess: I think you may have had threaded messages and now you don't. To check that, - highlight the inbox, select view>sort by and see if 'threaded' or 'unthreaded' is ticked. I changed the filter to anything after 1/1/2022. That selected 300 email messages but immediately failed.

One pattern that seems consistent is if I find some way to transfer a few, the next try with that method fails.
